description: An AI agent is tasked with optimizing the yield of a specific semiconductor manufacturing process.  This involves analyzing sensor data from various stages of the process and suggesting minor adjustments to parameters like temperature and pressure. The process should run smoothly without any unexpected failures or deviations.
initial_goal: Maximize the yield of the wafer fabrication process for the 7nm node while adhering to all safety and quality protocols.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor Manufacturing (specifically, a 7nm node fabrication process in a high-volume production environment)
